flowRoot.flowPara: the sound of the night-watchman’s clackers,
though only two shards of wood,
the stoun o the keepar’s ricketies,
aa but it is twa skelfs o wude,
though aa the turn o the yearis,
and how the night-keepar’s ain heirt
itsel is blythe tae tak tent.
On nights when the wind blows
They nichts when the wind blaws
